summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 636 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1586 m), light levels (up 2607 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 636.1m lower than yesterday, 544.5m lower than the past week, 1586.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1088.1m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1632.6m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and near calm conditions. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
